items.title: Awesome Homematic Updates on Nov 30 - Dec 06, 2020
items.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Nov 30 - Dec 06, 2020
items.content_text:
### CCU Addons

*   [HAP-HomeMatic (‚≠ê226)](https://github.com/thkl/hap-homematic) - RaspberryMatic / CCU3 addon to access your HomeMatic devices from HomeKit. Its much like [https://github.com/thkl/homebridge-homematic (‚≠ê180)](https://github.com/thkl/homebridge-homematic) but without homebridge.
items.content_html:
CCU Addons

  • HAP-HomeMatic (‚≠ê226) - RaspberryMatic / CCU3 addon to access your HomeMatic devices from HomeKit. Its much like https://github.com/thkl/homebridge-homematic (‚≠ê180) but without homebridge.

items.title: Awesome Homematic Updates on Mar 09 - Mar 15, 2020
items.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Mar 09 - Mar 15, 2020
items.content_text:
### CCU Addons

*   [Patcher (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/hobbyquaker/Patcher) - CCU3 Addon zur komfortablen Anwendung von Patches.

### Interfacing Software

*   [CCU-Jack (‚≠ê129)](https://github.com/mdzio/ccu-jack) - CCU-Jack bietet einen einfachen und sicheren REST-basierten Zugriff auf die CCU, auch als Addon verf√ºgbar.
*   [homebridge-homematic (‚≠ê180)](https://github.com/thkl/homebridge-homematic) - [Homebridge (‚≠ê25k)](https://github.com/nfarina/homebridge) Plugin zur Einbindung von Homematic Ger√§ten in HomeKit.
*   [hvl - Homematic Virtual Interface (‚≠ê55)](https://github.com/thkl/Homematic-Virtual-Interface) - Bindet Fremdger√§te (z.B. Hue, Harmony, Netatmo, Sonos) √ºber Plugins ein, auch als Addon verf√ºgbar.
items.content_html:
CCU Addons

  • Patcher (‚≠ê1) - CCU3 Addon zur komfortablen Anwendung von Patches.

Interfacing Software

  • CCU-Jack (‚≠ê129) - CCU-Jack bietet einen einfachen und sicheren REST-basierten Zugriff auf die CCU, auch als Addon verf√ºgbar.
  • homebridge-homematic (‚≠ê180) - Homebridge (‚≠ê25k) Plugin zur Einbindung von Homematic Ger√§ten in HomeKit.
  • hvl - Homematic Virtual Interface (‚≠ê55) - Bindet Fremdger√§te (z.B. Hue, Harmony, Netatmo, Sonos) √ºber Plugins ein, auch als Addon verf√ºgbar.

items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Aug 19 - Aug 25, 2019
items.content_text:
### Documentation

*   [Keymatic Konfiguration](https://homematic-forum.de/forum/viewtopic.php?f=31\&t=19196) - Beitrag von rewe0815 im Homematic Forum.

### CCU Alternatives

CCU Alternatives

items.title: Awesome Homematic Updates on Jun 17 - Jun 23, 2019
items.summary: 21 awesome projects updated on Jun 17 - Jun 23, 2019
items.content_text:
### Mobile Apps

*   [@home](https://www.athomeapp.de/) - iOS - (üíµ inApp-Purchase um Werbung zu entfernen)

### CCU Alternatives

*   [Homegear](https://homegear.eu/index.php/Main_Page) - Free and open source program to interface your smart home devices with your home automation software or your own scripts.

### CCU Addons

*   [CUxD](https://www.homematic-inside.de/software/tag/Zusatzsoftware) - Der "Leatherman" f√ºr die CCU. Verbindet FS20, ... (üíµ EnOcean, ...), stellt virtuelle Ger√§te und hilfreiche Tools zur Verf√ºgung.
*   [hm-print (‚≠ê12)](https://github.com/litti/hm-print) - CCU Programme drucken.
*   [hm-tools (‚≠ê24)](https://github.com/fhetty/hm-tools) - Sammlung von Tools f√ºr RaspberryMatic.
*   [hm\_pdetect (‚≠ê74)](https://github.com/jens-maus/hm_pdetect) - Anwesenheitserkennung √ºber die FRITZ!-Box
*   [RedMatic (‚≠ê538)](https://github.com/rdmtc/RedMatic) - [Node-RED](https://nodered.org/) als Addon f√ºr die Homematic CCU3 und RaspberryMatic. Liefert u.A. komfortable HomeKit-Integration und spezielle Nodes zur Anbindung der CCU an MQTT mit.

### Interfacing Software

*   [node-red-contrib-ccu (‚≠ê71)](https://github.com/rdmtc/node-red-contrib-ccu) - [Node-RED](https://nodered.org) Nodes for the Homematic CCU.

### Misc Software

*   [check\_homematic (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/hobbyquaker/check_homematic) - Nagios/Icinga Plugin for checking Homematic CCU.
*   [hm-simulator (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/hobbyquaker/hm-simulator) - Simulates (partly) a Homematic CCU.
*   [hmcfgusb](https://git.zerfleddert.de/cgi-bin/gitweb.cgi/hmcfgusb) - Utilities to use the HM-CFG-USB(2) on Linux/Unix.
*   [homematic-manager (‚≠ê192)](https://github.com/hobbyquaker/homematic-manager) - Manage homematic interface processes (rfd/hs485d/homegear).
*   [language-homematic (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/Ayngush/language-homematic) - Adds syntax highlighting and snippets to HomeMatic Script files in Atom.

### Software Modules

*   [binrpc (‚≠ê15)](https://github.com/hobbyquaker/binrpc) - Xmlrpc\_bin protocol client and server Node.js module.
*   [hm-discover (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/hobbyquaker/hm-discover) - Node.js module to discover Homematic CCUs and interfaces.
*   [homematic-rega (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/hobbyquaker/homematic-rega) - Node.js Homematic CCU ReGaHSS Remote Script Interface.
*   [homematicip-rest-api (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/coreGreenberet/homematicip-rest-api) - Python wrapper for the homematicIP REST API (Cloud / Access Point Based).
*   [homematic-xmlrpc (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/hobbyquaker/homematic-xmlrpc) - Xmlrpc client and server Node.js module.
*   [pmatic (‚≠ê35)](https://github.com/LarsMichelsen/pmatic) - Python API for Homematic. Easy to use.
*   [pyhomematic (‚≠ê86)](https://github.com/danielperna84/pyhomematic) - Python 3 Interface to interact with Homematic devices.

### Smart Home Software supporting Homematic

*   [ioBroker](https://www.iobroker.net/?lang=de)
items.content_html:
Mobile Apps

  • @home - iOS - (üíµ inApp-Purchase um Werbung zu entfernen)

CCU Alternatives

  • Homegear - Free and open source program to interface your smart home devices with your home automation software or your own scripts.

CCU Addons

  • CUxD - Der "Leatherman" f√ºr die CCU. Verbindet FS20, ... (üíµ EnOcean, ...), stellt virtuelle Ger√§te und hilfreiche Tools zur Verf√ºgung.
  • hm-print (‚≠ê12) - CCU Programme drucken.
  • hm-tools (‚≠ê24) - Sammlung von Tools f√ºr RaspberryMatic.
  • hm_pdetect (‚≠ê74) - Anwesenheitserkennung √ºber die FRITZ!-Box
  • RedMatic (‚≠ê538) - Node-RED als Addon f√ºr die Homematic CCU3 und RaspberryMatic. Liefert u.A. komfortable HomeKit-Integration und spezielle Nodes zur Anbindung der CCU an MQTT mit.

Interfacing Software

  • node-red-contrib-ccu (‚≠ê71) - Node-RED Nodes for the Homematic CCU.

Misc Software

  • check_homematic (‚≠ê5) - Nagios/Icinga Plugin for checking Homematic CCU.
  • hm-simulator (‚≠ê3) - Simulates (partly) a Homematic CCU.
  • hmcfgusb - Utilities to use the HM-CFG-USB(2) on Linux/Unix.
  • homematic-manager (‚≠ê192) - Manage homematic interface processes (rfd/hs485d/homegear).
  • language-homematic (‚≠ê4) - Adds syntax highlighting and snippets to HomeMatic Script files in Atom.

Software Modules

  • binrpc (‚≠ê15) - Xmlrpc_bin protocol client and server Node.js module.
  • hm-discover (‚≠ê6) - Node.js module to discover Homematic CCUs and interfaces.
  • homematic-rega (‚≠ê8) - Node.js Homematic CCU ReGaHSS Remote Script Interface.
  • homematicip-rest-api (‚≠ê1) - Python wrapper for the homematicIP REST API (Cloud / Access Point Based).
  • homematic-xmlrpc (‚≠ê7) - Xmlrpc client and server Node.js module.
  • pmatic (‚≠ê35) - Python API for Homematic. Easy to use.
  • pyhomematic (‚≠ê86) - Python 3 Interface to interact with Homematic devices.

Smart Home Software supporting Homematic

  • ioBroker

items.title: Awesome Homematic Updates on Jul 16 - Jul 22, 2018
items.summary: 11 awesome projects updated on Jul 16 - Jul 22, 2018
items.content_text:
### Community Ressources (mostly german language)

*   [Homematic Inside](https://www.homematic-inside.de/) - News, Blog, Tutorials und mehr.
*   [Technikkram](https://technikkram.net) - News, Blog, Tutorials und mehr.
*   [OwnSmartHome](https://ownsmarthome.de/category/homematic/) - News, Blog, Tutorials und mehr.

### Documentation

*   [Script Documentation](http://www.wikimatic.de/wiki/Script_Dokumentation) - Inoffizielle Homematic Script Referenz.

### CCU Alternatives

*   [RaspberryMatic (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/jens-maus/RaspberryMatic) - Lightweight, OCCU and Linux/buildroot-based distribution for running a HomeMatic CCU on embedded devices like the RaspberryPi.

### Alternative Sensors, Actuators and Hardware Modifications

*   [Homematic Wired Hombrew Hardware](https://github.com/jfische) - Verschiedene Homebrew Sensoren/Aktoren f√ºr Homematic Wired.

### CCU Addons

*   [Email (‚≠ê46)](https://github.com/jens-maus/hm_email) - HomeMatic CCU Addon f√ºr den Email Versand.
*   [Homematic-addon-hue (‚≠ê47)](https://github.com/j-a-n/homematic-addon-hue) - HomeMatic Addon f√ºr Philips Hue.
*   [Mosquitto (‚≠ê31)](https://github.com/hobbyquaker/ccu-addon-mosquitto) - Mosquitto packaged as Addon for the Homematic CCU3 and RaspberryMatic
*   [rmupdate (‚≠ê34)](https://github.com/j-a-n/raspberrymatic-addon-rmupdate) - RaspberryMatic Addon das RaspberryMatic selbst aktualisieren kann, vereinfacht die WLAN Konfiguration mit GUI und kann andere Addons ohne Zwangsreboot installieren und aktualisieren
*   [XML-API (‚≠ê125)](https://github.com/hobbyquaker/xml-api) - Vereinfachter CCU Zugriff via HTTP/XML.

Alternative Sensors, Actuators and Hardware Modifications

  • Email (‚≠ê46) - HomeMatic CCU Addon f√ºr den Email Versand.
  • Homematic-addon-hue (‚≠ê47) - HomeMatic Addon f√ºr Philips Hue.
  • Mosquitto (‚≠ê31) - Mosquitto packaged as Addon for the Homematic CCU3 and RaspberryMatic
  • rmupdate (‚≠ê34) - RaspberryMatic Addon das RaspberryMatic selbst aktualisieren kann, vereinfacht die WLAN Konfiguration mit GUI und kann andere Addons ohne Zwangsreboot installieren und aktualisieren
  • XML-API (‚≠ê125) - Vereinfachter CCU Zugriff via HTTP/XML.
